entry.title: First post of the mini-lab
entry.content:
Welcome to Benny.mini-lab

This is a place for storing what has come to my mind, and what I’ve done

I created this website using the mynt, a static site generator using python and jinja.

The style of the website is inspired by the leafletjs and skeleton website. These websites showed the beauty and power of simplicity. This website’s template was modified from the mynt’s init site with the skeleton css.

Currently, the about page was done. Two published paper that I have a little contribution were added in the findings page. The other pages will be fill-in while I am working.

Thanks for visiting.
